entry.title: DFPA INCREASES RESTRICTIONS TO HIGH, IFPL TO LEVEL 2
entry.summary: Effective July 1, DFPA raises Industrial Fire Precaution Levels to Level 2 and Public Use Restrictions to HIGH, limiting machinery use times for industry and residents. Fireworks remain prohibited in wildland areas.

entry.title: DFPA INCREASES RESTRICTIONS TO HIGH, IFPL TO LEVEL 2

entry.title: Prescribed Burn Scheduled at Dean Creek Elk Viewing Area June 30 – July 1
entry.summary: BLM fire officials plan a prescribed burn at Dean Creek Elk Viewing Area, June 30–July 1, covering 100 acres to improve elk habitat, reduce fuels, and urging caution for Highway 38 motorists due to possible smoke and short delays.
